description: Western Province/Northern Province - Enforce the Regulations relevant to Allowance Payments for Mayors Deputy Mayors and Councilors of Municipal Councils; Chairmen, Deputy Chairmen and Councilors of Urban Councils and Pradeshiya Sabhas with effect from 01.11.2014 - Amendment to notice published in Gaz. Ex. Ord. No. 1886/60 of 31.10.2014 by Northern Provincial Council
